roleset.name: set/solidify, combine into a solid whole

roles.note: I'm not sure either usage can take an arg0. If you see one, please send it in!

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: Both args, literal gelatin usage
example.text: However , the fact that the water gelled with the turkey makes me think it might be ingredients.

example.name: metaphorical usage
example.text: Hello I started university in September , did n't immediately gel with it obviously like most people .
